duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the charitable giving processes, employee engagement efforts, and team administration.
Assist with due diligence of charities and processes grant payments.
Update grants database and maintain all related records.
Provide support for grants reporting, employee matching gifts program, and internal communications.
Perform due diligence on charities, maintain intranet, and troubleshoot matching gifts application.
Support the corporate charitable donations process, volunteer programming, and special projects.
Complete tracking/data-entry of employee participation in Corporate Citizenship activities and impact reporting.
Support team budget process, track and process invoices, and coordinate meetings.
Monitor and respond to employee inquiries; provides details on programs; sends decline notices for unsolicited grant requests.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Certification in Grants Management is a plus.
